import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import MainNavbar from "../layout/MainNavbar"; import MainFooter from "../layout/MainFooter"; import "../site/SitePage.css"; const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { const pre = document.getElementById("preloader"); if (pre) { setTimeout(() => { pre.classList.add("hide"); setTimeout(() => pre.remove(), 400); document.body.classList.remove("preload-lock"); }, 2000); } }, []); return (
